menu.pizzas.pizza_margherita.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.pizzas.pizza_margherita.desc: The classic Italian pizza with San Marzano tomatoes, buffalo mozzarella PDO and fresh basil
menu.pizzas.pizza_napoletana.name: Neapolitan Pizza
menu.pizzas.pizza_napoletana.desc: Authentic Neapolitan pizza with high crust, tomato, buffalo mozzarella and basil
menu.pizzas.pizza_quattro_stagioni.name: Four Seasons Pizza
menu.pizzas.pizza_quattro_stagioni.desc: Cooked ham, porcini mushrooms, artichokes and black olives with mozzarella
menu.pizzas.pizza_diavola.name: Diavola Pizza
menu.pizzas.pizza_diavola.desc: Spicy Calabrian salami, mozzarella, tomato and fresh chillies

menu.pizzas.pizza_capricciosa.desc: Cooked ham, mushrooms, artichokes, olives and mozzarella

menu.pizzas.pizza_quattro_formaggi.desc: Mozzarella, Gorgonzola PDO, Parmigiano Reggiano and Fontina
menu.pizzas.pizza_marinara.name: Marinara Pizza
menu.pizzas.pizza_marinara.desc: The simplest and most traditional: tomato, garlic, oregano and extra virgin olive oil

menu.antipasti.insalata_caprese.name: Caprese Salad

menu.dolci.tiramisu.desc: The quintessential Italian dessert with ladyfingers, mascarpone, coffee and cocoa

menu.dolci.cannoli_siciliani.desc: Crunchy shells filled with sweet ricotta and chocolate chips
menu.dolci.panna_cotta_ai_frutti_di_bosc: Creamy dessert with fresh berry coulis
